nodes.text: The Cosmic Turbine was part of an ancient artifact of possible Celestial origin located in the Vultar system.

The structure was so large, it was mistaken for a planet until 4250 BBY. Following the Third Great Schism, the Dark Jedi were driven off Coruscant. Retreating to the system, they discovered the artifact and attempted to harness its power, inadvertently destroying themselves and the entire solar system.
Doctor Insmot Bowen later speculated that the Turbines were tractor-repulsors that were built to move entire planets and stars through hyperspace.
